message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first at a price of $16,000. I think it will be very valuable for you, even more so than my initial asking price.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I understand that $10,000 was a bit low, but $13,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,500 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
